txt.en: Oldheart, a vicious and ancient-looking buck of Thinglad, attacked you quite violently. You took his antlers as a trophy after winning this clash of horn and sword.

'Poor Oldheart met his match at last!

'Oldheart was once a beautiful creature, but he grew cruel and hard with time, heeding the whispers of evil in the earth and not the gentle goodness of LÃ³rien. 

'All creatures must die, and it was his time, but I will endeavour to remember him as the majestic beauty he once was!'
During your travels in Thinglad, you felled a vicious but ancient-looking buck. You should bring his antlers to the Elves of Haldirith.
Bring the antlers of Oldheart to Ninil
Ninil is in Haldirith.\n\nYou should bring the antlers of Oldheart to Ninil.
